channel.title: Photoshop CS3 - SUCKS
channel.description:
Hey,
I'm just letting you all know before you run to your favorite torrent sites and download the new version of Adobe's PhotoShop, it SUCKS. CS2 is WAY better. There is a loss of features. Also, they updated Flash, Fireworks, and Dreamweaver. I haven't downloaded any of those yet, but I will and I'll let you know when I do. Most people hate Microsoft, I hate Adobe.

item.title: Photoshop CS3 - SUCKS
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Well, I’ve only got cs2… I cbf to update

item.title: Photoshop CS3 - SUCKS
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

imo, maromedia has a hard time since they have to make flash, fireworks, dreamweaver, etc… Fireworks does suck, dreamweaver 8 rules, and flash has skillz… Though adobe prob changed stuff around in cs3 and its beta…

Read full topic

item.title: Photoshop CS3 - SUCKS
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

I tried making a web layout last night and went to use the rounded rectangle tool, its not a shape any more… then i had to use the marquee, they dont have a rounded rectangle marquee, plus all the little things that count… doesnt matter to me anymore though, just got back CS2 =)

Read full topic

item.title: Photoshop CS3 - SUCKS
item.dc:creator: @Kamu Kamu
item.description:
@Kamu wrote:

One thing I have known with Adobe, later versions never suck.

On a side note, thanks for telling me of the release. /me hits torrentz.com

Read full topic

The features aren’t lost, you need to find them.
